display_long_description:
ScaryScramblerVR is a terrifying twist on the classic Gorilla Tag movement system, throwing players into dark, unsettling environments where survival is anything but guaranteed. Using fast-paced, arms-only locomotion, you must navigate eerie, maze-like maps while a relentless, unpredictable entity stalks your every move.

This isn’t just another horror game—it’s an adrenaline-fueled test of reflexes and fear management. Every shadow hides a potential threat, and the AI-driven monster won’t rest until it catches its prey. With dynamic lighting, immersive sound design, and heart-pounding chase sequences, ScaryScramblerVR creates a sense of dread that lingers long after you take off the headset.

Whether you’re playing solo or with friends, no two rounds are ever the same. Stay quiet, stay fast, and whatever you do—don’t get caught in the scramble.
